title: Replace product image with cricket bat and update price to 999

requirements.text: In the ProductShowcase component, replace the image of the product card at grid position 3 (the element identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[3]/div[2]/div[1]) with a generated cricket bat image asset (cricket-bat.dim_400x400.png) stored in frontend/public/assets/generated/.

quotes: Replace this image by a cricket bat

acceptanceCriteria: The product card at position 3 displays a cricket bat image instead of the previous image.
The image renders correctly in the ProductCard component without broken src links.
The cricket bat image file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/cricket-bat.dim_400x400.png.

requirements.text: In the ProductShowcase component, update the price displayed in the product card at grid position 4 (the element identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[4]/div[3]/p[2]) to 999.
acceptanceCriteria: The price shown on the targeted product card reads 999 (or â‚¹999 / $999 consistent with existing formatting).
No other product card prices are modified.
The change is reflected in the hardcoded product data within ProductShowcase.tsx.

constraints: Only the two selected elements (XPath-identified product card image at position 3 and price at position 4) must be changed; all other product cards remain untouched.
Do not modify any immutable frontend paths.
nonGoals: Changing any other product card's image or price.
Altering navigation, hero section, about section, or contact section.

required: A clean studio-style cricket bat illustration on a transparent or light neutral background (cricket-bat.dim_400x400.png)
